title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Mar 26 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Mar 26 2022
description:
Party of Science runs into brick wall: Ketanji Brown Jackson unable to define a woman at confirmation hearing, claims she's "not a biologist." Clay says this will become a "famous," "all-time" line. Hawley grills Jackson on child porn ruling. Clay and Buck analyze some of her questionable lenient decisions. Don Lemon analyzes KBJ hearing, indicating others aren't smart enough to question what she says. Buck says, "To be fair, when you're Don Lemon, a lot of people are intellectual giants." Biden approval at 40%, Fauci, who C&B have choice words for, waits on new variant. Booker compares Judge Jackson to Jackie Robinson. C&B say nothing in Jackson hearing even approaches the ugliness of Kavanaugh confirmation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
